page.title: 05EDUCATION.
page.content: Some Primary Schools in our block. { ST.PAUL'S}(CHURCH OF ENGLAND) is 112 years old. It looks a bit like a church because it has two storeys and a bell tower. It is a small school with only three classes and four teachers. The good things are that we do maths and topic work. We go on lots of trips and we go swimming. { ST BARNABAS'}(CHURCH OF ENGLAND) was built a 100 years (1885) ago.But the children first went to school in our area in a wooden building in 1887. Our school is Victorian it has two storeys and a bell tower. The bell won't ring now as it has no clapper and is rusty. It was called St.Paul's Foundry School until 1913 then it changed to St Barnabas because he encouraged St Paul. Every year we parade dressed up and entertain the community.
